title: A question about League of Legends runes
body: I can't find flat seal runes (e.g. flat seal health runes). has flat runes being replaced by something else?

replies.body: Looking at the store (and the website), the options for Tier 3 Health Seals seem to be: +0.5% Health, +8 Health, +0.56/5 sec Regen, +1.33/lvl Health and 0.11/5 sec/lvl Regen.

they are just health runes.

You have normal and scaling, there is no "flat"
